Privacy Policy for NyasaCV
At NyasaCV, we prioritize your privacy and are committed to safeguarding the personal information you provide while using our resume-building platform. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we collect, how we use and protect that information, and your rights regarding your data. We adhere to the following fundamental principles:

1. Information We Collect
To provide you with the best service, we collect certain personal data when you interact with our website or use the NyasaCV service. This may include:

Personal Information: When you sign up, we collect basic personal information, including your name, email address, and login credentials.
Resume Information: Data you input into the resume builder, such as your work experience, education, contact details, skills, and any other information included in your CV.
Usage Data: We collect non-personal data like browser type, IP address, device information, referring/exit pages, and date/time stamps to improve your user experience.
Cookies: We use cookies to personalize your experience, remember your preferences, and track usage. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings.
2. How We Use Your Information
The personal information we collect is used for the following purposes:

Resume Creation: The primary use of your data is to allow you to create, edit, and download professional resumes using NyasaCV.
Personalization: We use your data to provide a personalized experience, such as customizing templates, remembering your previous resume drafts, and providing recommendations.
Communication: We may send you emails regarding account-related issues (such as password resets or feature updates) and respond to your inquiries.
Analytics and Improvements: We analyze data on how users interact with our platform to improve our services, add new features, and troubleshoot issues.
Legal Obligations: In some instances, we may need to retain or disclose your data to comply with legal obligations.
3. Data Security
We take data security very seriously and implement industry-standard practices to ensure your personal information is protected from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Our measures include:

Encryption: We use encryption (HTTPS/SSL) to secure data transmission between your browser and our servers.
Access Control: Only authorized personnel have access to your data, and we regularly review access policies to prevent unauthorized access.
Regular Monitoring: We continuously monitor our systems for vulnerabilities and implement the latest security updates.
4. Data Retention
We retain your personal information only for as long as is necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. If you choose to delete your account, we will remove your data from our servers unless retention is required for legal or compliance reasons.

5. Sharing Your Information
We do not share, sell, or trade your personal information to third parties, except in the following limited circumstances:

Service Providers: We may share data with third-party service providers who assist us in delivering services, such as cloud hosting or analytics services. These providers are bound by confidentiality agreements and are only permitted to use your data for specific purposes.
Legal Requirements: We may disclose personal information if required by law or in response to valid legal processes, such as subpoenas or court orders.
6. Your Rights
As a user of NyasaCV, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

Access: You can request access to the personal information we hold about you.
Correction: You have the right to correct or update any inaccuracies in your data.
Deletion: You may request the deletion of your personal information by contacting us. Once your account is deleted, your resume data and personal information will be removed unless required by law to retain it.
Opt-Out: You can opt out of receiving non-essential communications, such as promotional emails, by using the unsubscribe link provided in those emails.
Data Portability: You have the right to request a copy of your personal data in a commonly used, machine-readable format.
7. Cookies Policy
NyasaCV uses cookies to improve your browsing experience and ensure the functionality of our platform. Cookies are small data files stored on your device when you visit our site. We use the following types of cookies:

Essential Cookies: These are required for the operation of the website and allow you to use essential features like saving your resume drafts.
Analytical Cookies: These help us understand how users interact with our site by collecting anonymous information. This data is used to improve the user experience and optimize the platform.
Third-Party Cookies: We may also allow third-party service providers, such as Google Analytics, to place cookies for tracking and analysis.
You can control cookie settings in your browser. However, disabling cookies may limit some functionalities of the website.

8. International Data Transfers
If you are accessing NyasaCV from outside the country where our servers are located, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, or processed in a different jurisdiction. By using our service, you consent to the transfer of your data to these locations. We take necessary steps to ensure your information is handled securely, in line with this Privacy Policy.

9. Children's Privacy
NyasaCV is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected data from a child, we will take steps to delete that information promptly.

10. Changes to this Privacy Policy
We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. When we make changes, we will post the updated policy on this page and revise the “last updated” date at the top. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.

11. Contact Us
If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us at:

Email: info@nyasacv.com

By using NyasaCV, you consent to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy. If you disagree with any part of this policy, please discontinue use of our service.
